text: The Haima 8S is a compact Crossover SUV made by Haima since 2019. == History and Features == The Haima 8S was first launched in the Chinese market in June 2019 the SUV uses the Haima HMGA plataform (Haima Global Architecture). and has a 1.6 liter turbo petrol engine with a 6-speed both manual and automatic transmissions or a 7-speed DCT transmission hybrid and mild hybrid versions of the 8S that have a 1.2 liter turbo petrol engine are set to launch in the future. == Markets == The Haima 8S is sold mainly in the Chinese market. == References == Category:Chinese automobiles
title: Haima 8S
